curiosities.thread: Where are we in the uranium cycle? Supply/demand dynamics
curiosities.notes: BULLISH SETUP: AI data center demand = structural nuclear tailwind. 85% of investors expect $100-120/lb in 2026 (currently ~$80). Supply deficit widening — mined uranium <75% of reactor needs. Kazatomprom cutting 2026 production. Utilities must contract soon. Policy tailwinds (US/EU/Asia). Vehicles: Cameco (CCJ), Sprott Uranium Trust (SRUUF), Global X URA, NexGen (NXE) for leverage.
